descriptionNullable:
NLP Task
The goal of this task is to examine your skills in implementing NLP and machine learning algorithms, team working and communication, report writing, and presentation. In this assignment, a dataset of ‘clinical notes’ is provided. The clinical notes are available in the ‘TEXT’ field. We would expect you:
 1) extract meaningful sentences from the ‘TEXT’ field by using the Spacy library, and then 
2) classify the sentences by using ‘zero-shot learner.

Therefore, you have to provide these outputs. The Python code in which the requested algorithm is implemented.
title: Health Prescription data
subtitle: Health Prescription data
description:
NLP Task
The goal of this task is to examine your skills in implementing NLP and machine learning algorithms, team working and communication, report writing, and presentation. In this assignment, a dataset of ‘clinical notes’ is provided. The clinical notes are available in the ‘TEXT’ field. We would expect you:
 1) extract meaningful sentences from the ‘TEXT’ field by using the Spacy library, and then 
2) classify the sentences by using ‘zero-shot learner.

Therefore, you have to provide these outputs. The Python code in which the requested algorithm is implemented.
